data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 83,151 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in West Bank.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Bank, Palestina
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in West Bank, Palestina to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in West Bank, Palestina to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 83,151 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of West Bank, Palestina who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of West Bank to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of West Bank. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
